name: NYDailyNews
text:
Bill Murray’s son was arrested at a Black Lives Matter rally.

The 27-year-old Murray was picked up by cops after he allegedly attacked deputies, spit on and bit a police officer and threatened arson.
https://t.co/p4FxQyt370

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Oakland A’s owner reversed course, saying he will pay minor leaguers this season.

“These players represent our future and we will immediately begin paying our minor-league players. I take responsibility and I’m making it right," John Fisher said.
https://t.co/cK4h3uMBXU

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A multiracial family was mistaken for Antifa during a camping trip and terrorized by locals in Washington State.

The family was confronted by a group of roughly eight vehicles who were armed with guns and chainsaws outside a camping supplies store.
https://t.co/M3Y8sHUIgi

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Molotov cocktail-tossing Brooklyn lawyers’ home detention was revoked; an appeals panel sent them back to lock-up, instead.

The two are facing five to 20 years in prison for the attack.
https://t.co/q6O2THUbKl

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Two men responsible for a hit and run attack of an NYPD sergeant in the Bronx were arrested in South Carolina.

The sergeant and another officer were crossing a street when the two men in a black sedan barreled into the sergeant, sending him flying.
https://t.co/oWyBQiYkfZ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
OPINION: The videos have been seriously disturbing, but NYC's mayor insists he hasn’t seen clips of police roughing up protesters, violently taking bikes and arresting people for breaking curfew.

De Blasio’s had a pretty weak week. @harrysiegel writes
https://t.co/3NCJqeTOhe

name: NYDailyNews
text:
It’s official: Biden is the Democratic presidential nominee.

The former vice president has effectively been his party's leader since his last challenger in the Democratic primary, Bernie Sanders, ended his campaign in April.
https://t.co/3G09lr0uyn

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The NYPD suspended two cops under investigation for excessive force at anti-police protests.

One officer swatted a protesters phone away then pushed her to the ground. The other officer yanked a man's face mask down to pepper spray him in the face.
https://t.co/dJrVNZmpz3

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A Philadelphia man was freed after 23 years on death row for a murder he didn’t commit.

Walter Ogrod is technically just free on bail after a judge reduced the charges against him, but prosecutors have no plans to pursue the case.
https://t.co/JbyO30buDS

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Drew Brees patiently explained to Donald Trump what Colin Kaepernick was protesting in response to his criticism.

As Brees correctly pointed out: Kaepernick’s protests were always very specifically about police brutality and racism, not the American flag.
https://t.co/kSJxFAT3QD

name: NYDailyNews
text:

https://t.co/sY3sAOirhn

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Trump continued his rant on Kaepernick, which started years ago, calling him a “son of a bitch.”

“Drew Brees ... should not have taken back his original stance on honoring our magnificent American Flag," he tweeted. 
https://t.co/feH2XSveSX

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Trump says George Floyd is ‘looking down’ from heaven because of the marginal unemployment drop.

"It’s a great day for him"

Trump said the new jobs report “hopefully” brings comfort to Floyd, who died after a white Minneapolis cop dug a knee in his neck.
https://t.co/g5TRaQiDTG

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Washington Gov. Jay Inslee promised to review the investigation into the killing of Manuel Ellis by police.

In audio files, Ellis can be heard saying, “I can’t breathe,” the same words said by George Floyd in Minneapolis and Eric Garner on Staten Island.
https://t.co/mPA9JT0BbY
